제목: Someone ('시크릿가든 OST 그 남자' Eng Ver.)
가사:
If someone said I love you
would you think it true
that someone is the one who’s
standing next to you
Someone there without a sound
Just like a shadow on the ground
Is scared you’ll hear his heart
break as smiles at you
How can he bear to see you again
without letting you know the
truth but then
These feelings trapped inside him
They foolishly still hide him
from the fact that he will never
know if love’s a lie
To share your air to feel your
beating heart
Is the reason he breathes Why he
needs a new start
He’ll stand by you forever and
loves you
But you’ll never know the cry
beneath his smile
For far too long someone has
held it all inside
While playing the part of friend
and all that it implies
But the things he needs to say
Are more than a friend would
dare convey
But feelings unexpressed leave
pain that won’t subside
Someone wants to surrender to you
In hopes that you will say I
love you too
But more than words a notion
you share in his emotion
If you held him in your arms the
answer would be known
To be the one you run to in the
night
when you’re feeling afraid When
you turn out the light
He’ll scream it to the world or
whisper right beside you
You’ll never be alone
Don’t you know how desperately
I love you so
If you do then how can you just
let it go
Anybody but a fool wouldn’t know
How can I bear to see you again
without letting you know the
truth but then
These feelings trapped inside me
They foolishly still hide me
from the fact that I will never
know if love’s a lie
To share your air
to feel your beating heart
Is the reason I breathe Why I
need a new start
I'll stand with you forever
I love you but you’ll never
know the cry beneath my smile
